pages.text: Need to travel a long distance in an instant? It's no problem with the power of Magic(TM)!

pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: Once unlocked, <item>waystones</> can be traveled to from another waystone or a <item>warp stone</> across dimensions. This is done <idea>at the cost of experience</> (unless you are using a warp stone which has a cooldown). Waystones can often be found in villages.

pages.title: Markers and Signs
pages.text: <item>Waymarkers</> and <item>signposts</> take advantage an ender pearl's teleportation power. The waymarker can be seen as the destination and the signpost the starting point. Signposts point the direction of a waymarker and can be used to teleport to the waymarker only once you have discovered said waymarker. Signs can also point to a <item>waystone</>. The downside to this method of teleportation is that <idea>it does not work across dimensions</>.

pages.title: Wings of a Feather
pages.text: For quick personal travel, an <item>ender wing</> can be crafted to teleport in adventurer to the location where they arrived in Ardania <ooc>(world spawn)</>, and a <item>ender wing prime</> can be used to teleport back to their home. <idea>These must be used in the same dimension though.</>

pages.title: Stepping Through the Grave
pages.text: Krypta gives adventurers the ability to can use a <item>Tablet of Home</> to return to your bed, a <item>Tablet of Recall</> to return to the location of the gravestone used to enchant it, and a <item>Tablet of Assistance</> to teleport to another adventurer.

pages.title: Thaumic Portals
pages.text: It is rumoured that if a thaumaturgist spend enough time and effort on the research, they may find a way to create a <item>portal generator and anchor</> that can be used to travel across vast distances and dimensions.

pages.title: No Broom Needed
pages.text: <item>Witches' cauldrons</> can be teleported to if they have been properly named <ooc>(with a name tag)</>. This is done by throwing <item>dimensional sand</> into a boiling cauldron and then stepping into the cauldron and saying the name of the desired destination cauldron <ooc>(typing it in chat)</>.
Adepts of Lunord are able to create <item>celestial gateways</>, which can be used to travel to other gateways within or between other dimensions without needing to discover the gateways first.
